name: Order of the Dragon
description: The Order of the Dragon is established by handpicked wealthy elites to crush hostile empires. Investing large amounts of resources into training only a few exceptional warriors, the Order succeeds in raising an elite army unlike any other.
descriptionCN: 龙之骑士团由精选的富有精锐力量所建立，来摧毁敌对的帝国。骑士团投入大量资源来训练仅一小部分表现优异的战士，成功组建了一支与众不同的精锐军队。

overview.title: Civilization Bonuses
list: Villagers carry +40% more resources, gather +28% faster, and construct and repair buildings +20% faster.
Infantry and cavalry units are much stronger, but also more expensive to produce and take twice the population
Place Relics in Outposts, Stone Towers and Keeps for defensive and economic bonuses.
Relics placed in Docks increase ship attack speed by +5% per Relic (Max +20%).
Emplacements are -20% cheaper. Outpost sight range increased by +20%.
Buildings within influence of a Town Center gain the Emergency Repairs ability which can be activated to repair the building.

overview.title: Efficient Villagers
overview.description: Villagers gather 28% quicker, construct and repair buildings 20% faster, but cost 20% more Food to produce.

overview.title: Elite Equipment
overview.description: Research technologies like Heavy Torches, Scale Armor, and War Horses to further strengthen the might of the Order.

overview.title: Emplacement Architecture
overview.description: All emplacement technologies are -20% cheaper. Outpost sight range increased by +20%.

overview.title: Pushcarts
overview.description: Villagers carry +40% more resources than other civilizations.

overview.title: Influence
overview.description: Buildings constructed within the influence of a Town Center gain the Emergency Repairs ability which can be activated to repair the building for +150 health every second for 20 seconds.

overview.title: Unique Units
overview.description: The elite infantry and cavalry units of the Order - such as the Gilded Man-at-Arms, the Gilded Knight and others - have nearly twice the health of regular units and deal significantly more damage. However, they are much more costly to train and take up double the population space.

overviewCN.title: 文明加成
list: 村民携带资源 +40%，采集速度 +28%，建造和修理建筑的速度 +20%。
步兵和骑兵单位更强大，但生产成本更高，人口需求翻倍。
在哨站、石塔和城堡中放置圣物可获得防御和经济加成。
在码头放置圣物可使船舰攻击速度 +5% (最高 +20%)。
炮台建造成本 -20%。哨站的视野范围 +20%。
位于城镇中心影响范围内的建筑获得紧急修理能力，可激活该能力来修理建筑。

overviewCN.title: 高效村民
overviewCN.description: 村民采集速率加快 28%，建造建筑的速度加快 20%，但要多花费 20% 的食物来生产。

overviewCN.title: 精锐装备
overviewCN.description: 研究重型火炬、鳞甲和战马之类的科技，可进一步强化骑士团的力量。

overviewCN.title: 炮台建筑学
overviewCN.description: 所有炮台科技研究成本 -20%。哨站视野范围 +20%。

overviewCN.title: 手推车
overviewCN.description: 村民的资源运载量比其他文明多 40%。

overviewCN.title: 影响力
overviewCN.description: 城镇中心影响范围内的建筑将获得紧急修理能力，启动此能力可以修理建筑，每秒恢复 150 生命值，持续 20 秒。

overviewCN.title: 独特单位
overviewCN.description: 骑士团的精锐步兵和骑兵单位（例如镀金武士、镀金骑士等等）拥有正规单位近乎两倍的生命值，并且造成大幅增多的伤害。但是，他们的训练成本会高很多，并占用双倍的人口空间。
